author: Ove
content:
I completely agree with you on this. The thing is that I'm sure the circus had no intents at all to try to capitalise on this themselves, since this is not their core business. This makes it even more greedy, not allowing anybody else doing it instead.

Forgot to say, that was a fine cash register you found there. Nice dof and lots of graphical details that renders well in b&w.
